title: Strengthening Hospitality Practice Competencies: Integrating Web Design Psychology-Based e-Learning with Gagné’s Instructional Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain web design principles in e-learning designed according to Gagné’s Nine Events theory.
Learners can write measurement reports distinguishing cognitive structure and mental model changes into at least three stages through project-based assessments.
Learners can analyze the impact of HCI and animation elements on learning psychological processes with quantitative data and present findings with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
